member.name: T:OpenPath.Utility.Parser.CaseParser
member.summary: The case parser does different casing options for strings. For example, it can title case, Pascal case and camel.

member.name: M:OpenPath.Utility.Parser.CaseParser.ToJsonCase(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a string to format like JSON keys. (Example: This is my text converts to this_is_my_text)

member.name: M:OpenPath.Utility.Parser.CaseParser.ToTitleCase(System.String,System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: Converts a string to title case, captilizing every first word in string.
member.param: The value of the string you want to convert to title case.
If true, will remove extra whitespace (Default: fault).
Sets the local culture to base the conversion on (Default: "en-US", English).
member.returns: The string converted to title case.

member.name: M:OpenPath.Utility.Parser.CaseParser.ToProperTitleCase(System.String,System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: Converts a string to title case, captilizing the proper words in string.
member.param: The value of the string you want to convert to title case.
If true, will remove extra whitespace (Default: fault).
Sets the local culture to base the conversion on (Default: "en-US", English).
member.returns: The string converted to title case.

member.name: T:OpenPath.Utility.Parser.WhitespaceParser
member.summary: Extension methods for parsing whitespace from text.

member.name: M:OpenPath.Utility.Parser.WhitespaceParser.ReplaceWhitespace(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Replaces all types of whitespace in a string and replaces them with a replacement value.
member.param: The string you want to remove and replace whitespace from.
The value you want to replace the whitespace with (Default: " ").

member.name: M:OpenPath.Utility.Parser.WhitespaceParser.RemoveWhitespace(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Removes all types of whitespace in a string.
member.param: The string you want to remove whitespace from.
